original_text: I made me gardens and orchards, and I planted trees in them of all kind of fruits:
korean_text: 여러 동산과 과원을 만들고 그 가운데에 각종 과목을 심었으며

sentences.original_text: I made me gardens and orchards,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나를 위해 정원과 과수원을 만들었고,

sentences.original_text: and I planted trees in them
